<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.PDScopeSwitcher</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Switch between scopes when updating processes</description>
        <name>PDScopeSwitcher</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var PDScopeSwitcher = Class.create();
PDScopeSwitcher.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
        this.shouldOverrideTransactionScope;
        this.originalScope;
    },
    type: 'PDScopeSwitcher',

    // @param processScope - scope to switch to, same as scope of process being updated
    // call this at the start of a try block
    switchScope: function(processScope) {
        this.shouldOverrideTransactionScope = gs.getProperty('com.glide.pad.core.model.enableTransactionScopeOverride') &&
            Boolean(processScope);

        if (this.shouldOverrideTransactionScope) {
            this.originalScope = gs.getCurrentApplicationId();
            gs.setCurrentApplicationId(processScope);
        }
    },

    // call this at the in the finally block
    resetScope: function() {
        if (this.shouldOverrideTransactionScope && this.originalScope) {
            gs.setCurrentApplicationId(this.originalScope);
        }
    }
};]]></script>
